p.s: Thank you very much for writing back to me, after I told you about my problems.
With this sonnet you animated me to react fast and finally tell Jane about my infinity love to her until it is too late.
Without you I still would not have told her the truth about my feelings for her.
Especially your aspects of the running time convinced me to confess her my love at the same evening.
But to be honest, as I wrote you detailleddetailedabout my problem, I was pretty sure, that you will open my eyes and solve the problem for me.
I was sure about this, because I have read several sonnets from you.
In your sonnets and especially in the sonnet, which you sent to me, I pretty like, that you give impulses to take actions, without beeingbeing too precise.
With this the reader knows exactly what to do but on his way.
I know this has not directly to do with my problem, but I wanted to say that I love your plays in the globe theater.
I met there are many different people and the globe theater is the only place, where it is not important from where I come, after drinking beer with the others.
Because of this I forget every time, when I am there my problems.
With this letter, I wanted to thank you for your reply and the fantastic plays in the globe theatre.

p.signed: Best wishes and big thanks, John Smith
